verses.verse: My son <WH1121>, forget <WH7911> not my law <WH8451>; But let thy heart <WH3820> keep <WH5341> my commandments <WH4687>:
For length <WH753> of days <WH3117>, and years <WH8141> of life <WH2416>, And peace <WH7965>, will they add to thee <WH3254>.
Let not kindness <WH2617> and truth <WH571> forsake <WH5800> thee <WH7194>: Bind them about thy neck <WH1621>; Write <WH3789> them upon the tablet <WH3871> of thy heart <WH3820>:
So shalt thou find <WH4672> favor <WH2580> and good <WH2896> understanding <WH7922> In the sight <WH5869> of God <WH430> and man <WH120>.
Trust <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068> with all thy heart <WH3820>, And lean <WH8172> not upon thine own understanding <WH998>:
In all thy ways <WH1870> acknowledge <WH3045> him <WH3474>, And he will direct thy paths <WH734>.
Be not wise <WH2450> in thine own eyes <WH5869>; Fear <WH3372> Jehovah <WH3068>, and depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>:
It will be health <WH7500> to thy navel <WH8270>, And marrow <WH8250> to thy bones <WH6106>.
Honor <WH3513> Jehovah <WH3068> with thy substance <WH1952>, And with the first-fruits <WH7225> of all thine increase <WH8393>:
So shall thy barns <WH618> be filled <WH4390> with plenty <WH7647>, And thy vats <WH3342> shall overflow <WH6555> with new wine <WH8492>.
My son <WH1121>, despise <WH3988> not the chastening <WH4148> of Jehovah <WH3068>; Neither be weary <WH6973> of his reproof <WH8433>:
For whom Jehovah <WH3068> loveth <WH157> he reproveth <WH3198>; Even as a father <WH1> the son <WH1121> in whom he delighteth <WH7521>.
Happy <WH835> is the man <WH120> that findeth <WH4672> wisdom <WH2451>, And the man <WH120> that getteth <WH6329> understanding <WH8394>.
For the gaining <WH5504> of it is better <WH2896> than the gaining <WH5505> of silver <WH3701>, And the profit <WH8393> thereof than fine gold <WH2742>.
She is more precious <WH3368> than rubies <WH6443>: And none of the things thou canst desire <WH2656> are to be compared unto her <WH7737>.
Length <WH753> of days <WH3117> is in her right hand <WH3225>; In her left hand <WH8040> are riches <WH6239> and honor <WH3519>.
Her ways <WH1870> are ways <WH1870> of pleasantness <WH5278>, And all her paths <WH5410> are peace <WH7965>.
She is a tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> to them that lay hold <WH2388> upon her <WH833>: And happy is every one that retaineth her <WH8551>.
Jehovah <WH3068> by wisdom <WH2451> founded <WH3245> the earth <WH776>; By understanding <WH2451> he established <WH3559> the heavens <WH8064>.
By his knowledge <WH1847> the depths <WH8415> were broken up <WH1234>, And the skies <WH7834> drop down <WH7491> the dew <WH2919>.
My son <WH1121>, let them not depart <WH3868> from thine eyes <WH5869>; Keep <WH5341> sound wisdom <WH8454> and discretion <WH4209>:
So shall they be life <WH2416> unto thy soul <WH5315>, And grace <WH2580> to thy neck <WH1621>.
Then shalt thou walk <WH3212> in thy way <WH1870> securely <WH983>, And thy foot <WH7272> shall not stumble <WH5062>.
When thou liest down <WH7901>, thou shalt not be afraid <WH6342>: Yea <WH7901>, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep <WH8142> shall be sweet <WH6149>.
Be not afraid <WH3372> of sudden <WH6597> fear <WH6343>, Neither of the desolation <WH7722> of the wicked <WH7563>, when it cometh <WH935>:
For Jehovah <WH3068> will be thy confidence <WH3689>, And will keep <WH8104> thy foot <WH7272> from being taken <WH3921>.
Withhold <WH4513> not good <WH2896> from them to whom it is due <WH1167>, When it is in the power <WH410> of thy hand <WH3027> to do it <WH6213>.
Say <WH559> not unto thy neighbor <WH7453>, Go <WH3212>, and come again <WH7725>, And to-morrow <WH4279> I will give <WH5414>; When thou hast it by thee <WH3426>.
Devise <WH2790> not evil <WH7451> against thy neighbor <WH7453>, Seeing he dwelleth <WH3427> securely by thee <WH983>.
Strive <WH7378> not with a man <WH120> without cause <WH2600>, If he have done <WH1580> thee no harm <WH7451>.
Envy <WH7065> thou not the man of violence <WH376>, And choose <WH977> none of his ways <WH1870>.
For the perverse <WH3868> is an abomination <WH8441> to Jehovah <WH3068>; But his friendship <WH5475> is with the upright <WH3477>.
The curse <WH3994> of Jehovah <WH3068> is in the house <WH1004> of the wicked <WH7563>; But he blesseth <WH1288> the habitation <WH5116> of the righteous <WH6662>.
Surely he scoffeth <WH3887> at the scoffers <WH3887>; But he giveth <WH5414> grace <WH2580> unto the lowly <WH6035>.
The wise <WH2450> shall inherit <WH5157> glory <WH3519>; But shame <WH7036> shall be the promotion <WH7311> of fools <WH3684>.
